content: ▲bx11 as follows pull thru all lps on hook triangle *any yarn can be used for this mesh made *chain 2 yo insert hook project use the appropriate size in same chain as last triangle mesh st crochet hook for the chosen yarn was completed yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook skip 2 chain yo insert hook in next chain yo pull up please read all pattern notes prior to lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook yo starting this project pull thru all lps on hook triangle sn owflake motif mesh made * repeat from * to * 9 yo pull 6th chain to back thru 1st mc in addition to detailed instructions more times chain 2 outside stitch triangle yo pull up lp yo pull thru that follow chart 1 snowflake double_crochet in same chain as last triangle mesh 2 lps on hook skip 2 cc chain yo pull snowflake design has been provided st was completed next cc chain to back thru next mc for reference chain 5 at end of all row until noted triangle yo pull up lp yo pull thru right side otherwise 2 lps on hook yo pull thru all lps foundation + row 1 mc 12 downward-pointing and 11 on hook triangle mesh made upward-pointing triangles made foundation + row 1 cc chain 39 mark 6th chain from hook set-up lay chain across front of mc windows placing marked chain over first downward-pointing triangle line up tail end of chain with last downward-pointing triangle using a *chain 2 yo pull same cc chain to back stitch marker to hold it in place and thru same mc triangle as last making sure there are no twists in chain 39 working in back ridge of chain triangle mesh st was completed yo the chain see photo yo insert hook in 6th pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on chain from hook yo pull up lp yo working all stitches in back ridge hook skip 2 cc chain yo pull next cc pull thru 2 lps on hook skip 2 chain yo of chain and pulling specified chain to the chain to back thru next mc triangle ©2022 kathryn a clark page 4 of 12 #m22-001 yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on wrong side turn work hook yo pull thru all lps on hook row 4 mc wrong side triangle mesh made * move cc to back of work row 8 mc repeat from * to * 9 more times outside stitch ▲bx4 ▲b ▲b move cc to back of work ▲bx2 ▲b ▲b ▲bx4
